Title: Day 7: 8:00 A.M. - 9:00 A.M.
Plot: Since Jack Bauer has been pulled from his senate sub-committee hearing to assist with the deadly domestic threat and the investigation of former colleague Tony Almeida, his new undefined role is to help secure the nation. Meanwhile, President Allison Taylor presides over the escalating time-sensitive dilemmas linked to the unrest in Sangala. Writer: Howard Gordon ,  Joel Surnow ,  Michael Loceff
GuestStars: Carlo Rota, Carly Pope, Dameon Clarke, Hakeem Kae-Kazim, Isaach De Bankole, Jennifer Carta, Marina Black, Mark Aiken, Peter Wingfield, Steve Cell, Tonya Pinkins, Warren Kole
